title: Eating sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating sweets in the palms has many good connotations and meanings for individuals and instills optimism and fun in their hearts, but people want to understand what these dreams specifically indicate, so let us read the article below so that we can learn about them. What is the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream? Seeing the dreamer eating Candy during his sleep is an indication that he has achieved a very important position in his career largely as a result of his diligence in developing it. Eating sweets in a dream indicates one’s ability to achieve many things that he has always dreamed of and he will be proud of himself for what he will be able to achieve. If the dreamer dreams of eating sweets Different, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money that will make him a very good living condition. Seeing the dreamer in his dream eating the candy that he loves symbolizes the good news that will reach him in the coming period, which will put him in a very good psychological condition. Sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision in a dream of eating sweets as an indication of the abundance of goodness that he will enjoy in his life as a result of his fear of God Almighty in all his actions. If a person sees in his dream that he is eating sweets, this indicates abundant profits that he will soon accumulate behind His work will flourish greatly. If the dreamer sees during his sleep eating sweets and their taste is very beautiful, then this expresses his well-known qualities that make his status excellent in the hearts of many around him. Seeing the dreamer in his dream that he was eating sweets symbolizes the stable psychological state that he was in. He enjoys it at that time as a result of being away from everything that bothers him. What is the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a single woman? Eating sweets in a dream for a single woman is an indication of the good events that occurred in her life at that time that make her in a very good state. What is the interpretation of eating makrot in a dream For a single woman? If the dreamer sees her eating sweets with great pleasure during her sleep, this expresses that she will soon receive a marriage proposal from someone who suits her and with whom she lives with great stability and satisfaction. If the dreamer dreams of eating large quantities of sweets, this is a sign that she will be able to achieve many things that she has been dreaming of for a while. Long. To dream of a girl asking for sweets, but she refuses to eat them, this indicates her desire not to make mistakes and be careful before taking any step in her life. What is the interpretation of making sweets in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried woman dreams of making sweets and in reality she suffers from a crisis Financially, this is a sign that she will get a lot of money that will make her living conditions more stable. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she was making sweets and was a student, this means that she achieved the highest grades at the end of the school year and therefore feels great pride in her family. The dreamer’s vision In her dream that she wants to make candy, it symbolizes her lack of emotional stability and her overwhelming desire to connect with someone and experience a deep love story. Seeing a woman in her dream making candy is in a state of joy and pleasure.

title: Interpretation of seeing mushrooms in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of viewing mushrooms through the website Roy2a.com, fungi are living organisms that look like an umbrella shape and have many different types and uses and are widely distributed in environments. They are found in dry and wet soil, salty and insulating water, and there are species used for eating, such as love nests, and there are poisonous seeds. Seeing mushrooms in one’s fingertips has many connotations. Today we will present the most important interpretations of seeing mushrooms in a dream by leading scholars of interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing mushrooms in a dream: Seeing yourself eating mushrooms in a dream is an indication of sustenance, benefits, and goodness that will come to the dreamer. Seeing mushrooms in a dream indicates anxiety and sadness that will befall the fortuneteller. Seeing a poor man eating mushrooms during his sleep is a clear sign of a physical change in good condition. Seeing large mushrooms in a dream is considered to be A good vision promises material prosperity and good status for the pioneer. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a live oven in a dream Interpretation of seeing mushrooms in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that he sees mushrooms in a dream The significance of a wife or woman in a man’s life. Seeing large mushrooms in a dream indicates this good wife and many Goodness about the dreamer. Seeing mushrooms in a dream is a sign of things that happen quickly and pass quickly. Seeing mushrooms in a dream indicates the height of insight and his ability to bear his responsibilities. Interpretation of seeing mushrooms in a dream for a single woman. Seeing yourself eating mushrooms in a dream for a single woman is one of the promising visions for her marriage to a good man. Vision White mushrooms in a dream mean that the girl has a lot of good news and signs that she will enjoy in the future and in her academic excellence. Large mushrooms in a dream are better than small mushrooms. In their interpretation and connotations, they promise broad support. Seeing rotten mushrooms portends to a girl in a dream a sign of her inability to make the right decisions about her future. A group of mushrooms in a dream for a girl announces bad friends around her. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing living in a dream. Interpretation of seeing mushrooms in a dream for a married woman. Seeing mushrooms growing inside the house indicates the presence of a married woman. An indication that she will give birth to a child soon. Seeing eating mushrooms in a dream for a married woman. Sample of Her stable life, her good condition, and her family. If a married woman sees herself eating mushrooms with her husband, this indicates an improvement in the relationship between them and the end of problems. Seeing a group of mushrooms indicates that a married woman will change her physical condition for the better. Seeing white mushrooms in a dream for a married woman is a good vision that portends happy choices and a diet. Broad.Interpretation of seeing mushrooms in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing eating mushrooms in a dream for a pregnant woman. Statement of the sex of her fetus and it will be communicated, God willing. Seeing mushrooms indicates the presence of a pregnant woman for easy pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of seeing mushrooms in a dream for a man. Seeing an invalid mushroom in a dream is a sign that he is making wrong decisions in his life. Seeing poisonous mushrooms in a dream indicates a failure

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman’s engagement from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about a single woman’s engagement to someone she knows, and the interpretation of a dream about the engagement of my only friend

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a single woman: Interpreters believe that the dream looks good and brings a lot of news to the dreamer, although in some cases it indicates bad. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the dream of engagement for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and the leading scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of the dream of Ibn Sirin’s engagement to an unmarried woman. What is the interpretation of the dream of engagement for a single woman? The vision of an engagement for an unmarried woman is evidence of her feeling of emotional emptiness and her desire to Marriage, and her marriage to a good, handsome man makes her days happy. If the dreamer sees breaking the engagement in her dream and getting engaged in reality, this indicates that her wedding date is approaching and that she will be happy and secure in her partner’s care for her marriage in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s engagement to an unmarried woman: Ibn Sirin sees You will see that seeing an unmarried woman’s engagement is a sign that she will soon marry someone she knows, and if the person with the vision dreams of her engagement party and is happy, he will hear happy news about her family. In the following days, she excelled in her studies and obtained the highest grades. If an unmarried woman sees that her boss at work is proposing to her, the dream predicts that she will soon get a promotion at work because she put in a lot of effort to get this promotion, but if the dreamer deals with reality And she saw her engagement party for someone other than her current partner. This may indicate her desire to divorce and break off the engagement. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type “Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website” on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of an engagement dream for a single woman according to Imam Al-Sadiq in If the dreamer sees her engagement to a stranger, the dream symbolizes her good morals and good behavior among people and portends a change in her circumstances for the better, indicating that she is entering a new phase of her life full of happiness and vitality. Fun. If the dreamer is currently living a love story and dreams of her engagement to her partner, then the dream foretells that she will marry him soon and have many children in the near future, but if the dreamer sees in her dream her engagement to an old man, this indicates that she will soon receive a large sum. Of money.Interpretation of a dream about a single woman’s engagement to someone she knows: In the event that the dreamer sees someone she knows proposing to her in a dream, she will marry this person in reality, and if the dreamer sees a married man proposing to him in a dream, this indicates that she will hear. Good news about this person in the near future, but if the engagement takes place. A woman who sees in a dream a person she hates in reality, this may foretell that she will face some difficulties in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about engagement by someone I do not know. Seeing an engagement with an unknown person means that it will happen Positive developments will soon occur in the dreamer’s life. If the dreamer is engaged to someone she does not know and feels sad, the dream indicates that there are some obstacles that hinder her and prevent her from succeeding in her new life.

preview.html: It can also express unwanted things, which we will learn about clearly during our article today from our interpreter, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing dead people starving in a dream for a lonely girl. Many interpreters believe that seeing a lonely girl in a dream is famine. Among the scenes that express The plight of this girl, and she will have a good time, God willing. If a virgin dreams that her dead father is hungry and asks her for food. The dream is a message from her father telling her that he misses someone who remembers him, and God Almighty knows best. And if this girl is going through a difficult time in her life and has a dream in which she sees... A dead person asking her for food. She will be in serious financial trouble in the coming days and God Almighty knows what it is. However, if a single lady has a lot of money and has a dream in which she sees a dead person asking her for food, she should feel concerned. This vision serves as a reminder To save and manage her money wisely. Because you are likely to suffer a huge loss in the coming days, and God knows best. While Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a virgin in her dream means her death, he is hungry and asks her to eat. This is a negative vision, because it indicates that I will be exposed to many crises, and in In a very short time I will be nervous, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is sitting with her deceased father and eating with him, then she should worry. Because this dream shows the girl’s longing for her father or her loneliness and isolation. See also: Dreaming about kissing the dead. Interpretation of seeing the dead starving in a dream. For a married woman: Below are some of the most common readings and meanings of seeing dead people starving in a dream for a married woman: This is an indication of that person’s need for supplication and zakat to enjoy the afterlife with his Lord, and only God knows what is best for him. If the dead person was a sinner and committed many sins before his death And he was a relative of the married woman. She also dreamed of being hungry. This vision is a message of forgiveness for him, and forgiveness for what he did to her, may God Almighty have mercy on him. If a married woman sees this dream in her sleep, she should focus on the debts owed to the deceased before his death. He must pay For the dead to rest in the afterlife, and only God knows how much that will cost. On the other hand, senior jurists specializing in reading dreams and visions believe that seeing the dead starving in a dream is one of the disturbing scenes in a married woman’s dream, because it portends the occurrence of unfavorable events. Or she will lose someone. You care about his affairs, and God knows what is best. If a dead person is hungry and enters a married woman’s house to eat, this is an unfavorable nightmare. Because it predicts that he will be afflicted in the coming days with anxiety and sadness. The meaning of seeing a dead person starving in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. The interpretation of seeing a dead person starving for a pregnant woman differs from the interpretation of a divorced woman. As follows: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is sitting with one of her deceased acquaintances in a dream, eating with them and feeling great joy. This dream foretells that she will soon be freed from the many burdens and pressures that she has experienced in her life. Perhaps this dream

title: Interpretation of food in a dream includes the correct interpretations

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of food in a dream from Muhammad Yun Sirin in detail. Food represents fuel for the human body, so we cannot live without eating food that protects the safety and health of the body and protects it from diseases. Happiness for a man, especially if it is his favorite food. However, this is a sign that seeing food of any kind in a dream indicates that we will learn about it in the next article from an encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of food in a dream Seeing food in a dream is considered a praiseworthy dream, especially If it is prepared in a good way and its appearance is good and organized, which makes the person accept it and love its taste. Whoever dreams that he brings guests to his home and offers them food, then this shows his love for goodness, generosity, and generosity in reality. The vision of offering food to others indicates the dreamer’s relief from his worries and sorrows, and the alleviation of his conditions. And his recovery if he is sick. Whoever sees that he is eating alone, his vision indicates that he feels lonely and isolated and that he is going through a difficult psychological period. When a person sees himself sitting to eat, but finds the table empty, this indicates that he is going through a period of frustration and despair these days. Whoever dreams of going somewhere and finding food and seeing it, this indicates that he heard good news and that happy things will happen to him in the near future. Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees in his dream food containing hot peppers, his vision shows the transition of his life from calm and stability to Disturbances, problems, and instability. Seeing food not placed on the table indicates the presence of some problems and crises in the dreamer’s life. Whoever sees himself preparing food and it remains unripe, this indicates that he will not be able to achieve his dreams, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating a lot in a dream: seeing a lot of food Food in a dream is one of the good dreams that portends good news, and the abundance of good deeds and blessings in the life of the dreamer. Whoever sees that there is a large dining table in his house with many people gathered around it, this indicates the generosity of insight, his good deeds, and his donation to the poor. And whoever tastes the food on the table finds it sweet. Seeing him is a sign of happiness, joys and good things that will happen in his life in the future. Giving food in a dream Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a man offering food or distributing it to others in a dream indicates that he is a good person who seeks to help others in solving their problems and is a source of help and happiness for many people. Eating In a dream for a single woman, seeing an unmarried girl eating a large amount of food but not feeling full indicates that she is a good girl who adheres to virtuous morals, principles and values ​​and has good behavior among people. Whoever sees that she is eating a lot of food while offering a religion of solace, her vision does not deserve praise. ,F

Food represents fuel for the human body, so we cannot live without eating food that protects the safety and health of the body and protects it from diseases. Happiness for a man, especially if it is his favorite food. However, this is a sign that seeing food of any kind in a dream indicates that we will learn about it in the next article from an encyclopedia, so follow us. title: A rooster in a dream and the interpretation of seeing a rooster in a dream

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a rooster in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a rooster in a dream as an indication that the dreamer will occupy a great position and a lot will be done. Seeing a rooster could be a sign for the muezzin. Ibn Sirin said that a rooster in a dream indicates the owner of the house and could be a sign for the boy. And the friend, believer, and lover. Seeing a rooster in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a rooster in a married woman’s dream is a good sign for her. Who does she see? The white rooster in a dream is a sign of happiness and joy, and here she lives with her husband. Seeing a rooster in bed in a dream is evidence of her husband’s faith in her. Seeing a rooster In the dream of a single woman: An unmarried woman who sees a white rooster in a dream, this is the good news of her marriage to her relative and evidence of the happiness and joy she enjoys with her life partner. And to see a red rooster in a dream, this is evidence that he has married someone he loves and knows well. And to see a black rooster in a dream is evidence However, you are marrying a person you do not know and you do not have feelings or love for him. Seeing a rooster in a pregnant dream: A pregnant woman who sees a rooster in a dream, this is good news that the birth is male, and God knows best, and she will have a bright future and a wonderful relationship. And seeing a rooster with ducks or geese in a dream, This is a sign of happiness and joy that will dominate him. Interpretation of seeing a rooster in a man’s dreamThe Man: Anyone who sees a rooster in a dream, this is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money and a lot of sustenance, and it could be a sign of him obtaining a high position in his field of work or obtaining a new job. Interpretation of seeing a rooster in a dream for a widow or divorced woman. A widow or divorced woman sees a rooster in a dream. This dream shows how much she needs a man in her life and marriage. Hearing a rooster in a dream is evidence of her imminent wedding date. Whoever eats rooster meat or dreams of slaughtering it, this dream indicates that she She lives in the memory of her ex-husband and will live without marrying anyone else. Interpretation of seeing a rooster flying in a dream: Anyone who dreams of a rooster outside the house and flying, then this dream indicates the loss of a source of livelihood, a financial crisis, and the loss of a job. Interpretation of seeing a rooster buying or selling in a dream Selling a rooster in a dream and the dreamer is on He is about to get married, so this dream indicates postponing the wedding date. Seeing buying a rooster in a dream is a sign of joy and happiness for entering the dreamer’s life and hearing happy news. The sound of a rooster in a dream: Whoever hears the sound of a rooster crowing in a dream, this is a blame and reprimand from someone dear to the dreamer. And a rooster crowing in a dream. A dream is evidence of a lot of good and happy news. Interpretation of giving a rooster in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that someone is giving him a rooster, then this dream has good skin and an indication of his high status and occupies a great position among people. Interpretation of slaughtering a rooster in a dream: Whoever dreams of slaughtering a rooster, this is a sign of his negligence in performing his duties. Praying and not responding to the call. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations about seeing a rooster in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article.

title: Interpretation of a dream about rain for a single woman

preview.html: Including the dreamer’s current state of mind in addition to the intensity and scope of the rain, but through our website gptafser.com/ we will present everything related to the interpretation of a dream about rain for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a single girl. For single women, seeing rain in a dream. Reducing pain and ending worries And sorrows. If the dreamer hears the sound of thunder, this indicates her fear of the person she loves and her belief that he will not fulfill his promises to her. It was also once believed that seeing rain could sometimes indicate a return to a former lover. Scientists interpreted heavy rain as Evidence that the dreamer will soon enter into a new love relationship that will make her happy and satisfying. See also: Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman notices rain and feels comfortable as a result. This indicates that she is working hard to ensure the comfort of her family and that her husband is grateful For everything she does. Leading scholars and commentators agreed that a married woman sees rain in her dream. It represents her virtues, such as integrity, protects her life and her family, and does not allow anyone to interfere in her affairs. Rainfall in a married woman’s house in her dream portends some unwanted developments Which will have a negative impact on her life and the lives of the people around her. The meaning of seeing rain in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation When a woman is having difficulty getting pregnant and sees rain in a dream. This is a sign that God is granting her the blessing of childbearing and giving birth, and that she will become pregnant. A pregnant woman’s dream of rain is interpreted as A sign of goodness and blessings that will come to her life. According to the scholar Ibn Shaheen, a pregnant woman who dreams of rain indicates that she will give birth to a good boy. If she sees clear rainwater, this means that she is loved by those around her. She is blessed with good morals and other positive qualities. Read also: Water Rain enters the house in a dream. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a man and its meaning. Among the wonderful dreams that guarantee the man a better job promotion than his current job. Or a prominent job in which he earns a lot of money. Any dream of rain indicates high moral standards and positive traits. If the dreamer bathes in rainwater. This indicates a great desire to confess his sins and atone for all his past actions. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for young people and its meaning: This dream indicates that the young man will have many opportunities and that his life will change for the better. When he falls in the rain, it shows his closeness to God Almighty. He wants to wash away everything Sins that he committed before. When she drinks from the rain, this indicates that she is lenient, generous, and has good manners. You may be interested in: Interpretation of dreams about rain in the courtyard of the house for single women. Seeing a dream about rain for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream walking in the rain. Evidence that God will compensate her and transform Her sorrows turn to joy. If a woman imagines herself bathing in the rain. This represents her desire to return to God and purify her of all the mistakes she has committed throughout her life. And to improve all her circumstances and problems from what was...

title: Learn about Ibn Shirin’s interpretation of seeing the Crown Prince in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream is one of the visions that carries many meanings and interpretations that differ in their interpretation according to the person of the dreamer, the events that followed him, and his circumstances, which prompted us to present what was said about it by scholars to clarify the matter. The debate about it continues as much as possible. Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream: Seeing an heir in a dream indicates good news and blessings that greet him, the right thing. Seeing the heir in a dream and sleeping next to him is a sign of bad things happening to him, but if he is in a country other than his own, then this is a sign of opportunities. The good that he will bring with him. Goodness and changing the course of his life. Interpretation of seeing the heir in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the crown prince in a dream, Ibn Sirin, indicates the happy tidings that come to him and the wishes that reach him, but if his face is angry, this is a sign of the actions that he performs that do not please God and His Messenger. Who is characterized by good character and closeness to God. Seeing the Crown Prince of Ibn Sirin in a dream is evidence of the grants he receives, and the determination and strong will he possesses to face difficulties. Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an heir in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates marriage or engagement to a person with A high position in society and a source of livelihood that will come to her in the near future, and God knows best. But if he appears wearing white clothes, this is a sign of happiness and satisfaction that you are living with your future husband. Seeing an heiress in an unmarried woman’s dream, if she is gifted with something, symbolizes the academic and career status she is gaining, which will affect her positively and make her more attractive in life. The right path.Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream for a married woman. Seeing an heir in a dream for a married woman is considered a sign of the husband and son, and it also carries a sign of what her husband gets in terms of returns and financial stability for the work or project he is undertaking, successes and excellence. Which her son acquires, their life is a life of peace and general peace. Seeing an heir for a married woman, if the guardian gives her a gift, carries a sign of the health of the new baby, which strengthens her relationship with her husband and makes it more stable and cohesive, so she should thank God for this. Generosity and blessings. Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing an heir in a dream for a pregnant woman is an indication that everything in her womb is male, but if she presents her with jewelry, this is an indication that what she gives birth to is also female. Because it may indicate the fulfillment of many of her aspirations, and it may also symbolize the luxury and great relationship that this fetus enjoys in society. Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing an heir in a dream for divorced women shows the end of all the miserable days and bitter experiences that she is going through, and the return of the relationship between her and her husband. To fine, it is also shown that she is once again related to someone. Just a man who gives her love and care, which makes him a good successor from God because of the problems she went through during her life. Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream for a man: seeing an heir

title: Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Social status is one of the things that jurists rely on in interpreting the vision with the details of the dream, and this is what we explain in the following lines on our website, translated. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a horse in a dream for an unmarried girl. She has good skin and will soon marry a person who enjoys... With the qualities that she has always wanted throughout her life. As for the girl who sees herself riding a horse in a dream, it is a sign that she is a leader, and controls the course of her life. It also indicates that she is a self-sufficient person and does not need others. Likewise, the unmarried girl who sees a dead horse in A dream. It is an unpleasant vision that confirms that the girl will fall into great calamity and crises in her life. If the girl sees someone giving her a horse in a dream. The vision means that for the girl, she will get great benefit from this person. As well as seeing a white horse and a beautiful figure in the dream of an unmarried girl. Married. Be a sign of joy and happiness and hear the good news. The appearance of a blond horse in an unmarried girl’s dream. It symbolizes that she is sick, and God knows best. An unmarried girl also sees a weak or sick horse in her dream. It is a metaphor for her bad relationship with her father, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation Ibn Sirin to see a horse in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a married woman. The appearance of a horse in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she is bearing the burdens of life. Seeing a strong and beautiful horse in a married woman’s dream. It symbolizes her position in her husband’s life and his appreciation for her. Likewise, a married woman sees her husband He gives her a horse as a gift in a dream. It is a good omen for the imminent appearance of a long-awaited pregnancy. A horse in a married woman’s dream is a sign of happy news in the life of the owner of his dreams. Seeing a horse in a dream for a married woman. Good omen for the strength of the relationship between spouses, and a feeling of stability with her. As well A married woman sees a horse, but she is weak in a dream. It appears that the woman’s relationship with her husband is very tense and she needs to make an effort to fix it. A married woman with children saw a sick horse in a dream. It is a sign that she hears bad news about her children, and God knows best. The appearance of a black horse in a dream indicates A married woman to prosperity, well-being and a lot of money. While a woman who sees a red horse in a dream. It is a metaphor for the presence of a cheerful woman in the life of the dreamer’s husband, but the latter defeated her and kept her husband. The appearance of a blond horse in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of great sadness and anguish that she will fall into. The dreamer, and God knows best. Likewise, a married woman sees her husband riding a horse and entering the house in a dream. It is a metaphor for her husband’s pride in himself. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a man and its meaning. A man dreams that he is riding a horse in a dream. It is an indication of his pride and self-esteem and his status on the ground. And the man The one who saw a horse jumping in a dream and retired. It is a metaphor for the dreamer seeking a pension to meet the requirements of his household. As for the man who sees himself drinking horse milk in a dream. It is a good omen that will happen to riches and riches in due time.
